   20: -module(rpc_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: -export([off_heap/1,
   25:          call/1, call_reqtmo/1, block_call/1, multicall/1,
   26:          multicall_timeout/1, multicall_reqtmo/1, multicall_dies/1,
   27:          multicall_node_dies/1, called_dies/1, called_node_dies/1, 
   28: 	 called_throws/1, call_benchmark/1, async_call/1,
   29:          call_against_old_node/1,
   30:          multicall_mix/1,
   31:          timeout_limit/1,
   32:          call_old_against_new/1,
   33:          multicall_old_against_new/1,
   34:          cast_old_against_new/1]).
   35: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   36: 
   37: -export([call_func1/1]).
   38: 
   39: -export([suicide/2, suicide/3, f/0, f2/0]).
   40: 
   41: -export([call_old_against_new_test/2]).
   42: -export([multicall_old_against_new_test/2]).
   43: -export([cast_old_against_new_test/2]).
   44: 
   45: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   46: 
   47: -ifndef(CT_PEER).
   48: %% This module needs to compile on old nodes...
   49: -define(CT_PEER(), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   50: -define(CT_PEER(Opts), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   51: -define(CT_PEER_REL(Opts, Release, PrivDir), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   52: -endif.
   53: 
   54: suite() ->
   55:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   56:      {timetrap,{minutes,2}}].
   57: 
   58: all() -> 
   59:     [off_heap, call, call_reqtmo, block_call, multicall,
   60:      multicall_timeout, call_reqtmo, multicall_dies,
   61:      multicall_node_dies, called_dies, called_node_dies,
   62:      called_throws, call_benchmark, async_call,
   63:      call_against_old_node,
   64:      multicall_mix, timeout_limit, call_old_against_new,
   65:      multicall_old_against_new, cast_old_against_new].
   66: 
   67: groups() -> 
   68:     [].
   69: 
   70: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
   71:     [{testcase, Func}|Config].
   72: 
   73: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
   74:     ok.
   75: 
   76: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   80:     ok.
   81: 
   82: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   83:     Config.
   84: 
   85: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   86:     Config.
   87: 
   88: off_heap(_Config) ->
   89:     %% The rex server process may receive a huge amount of
   90:     %% messages. Make sure that they are stored off heap to
   91:     %% avoid excessive GCs.
   92:     MQD = message_queue_data,
   93:     {MQD,off_heap} = process_info(whereis(rex), MQD),
   94:     ok.
   95: 
   96: 
   97: %% Test different rpc calls.
   98: call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   99:     {ok, _P1, N1} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "3"]),
  100:     {ok, _P2, N2} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "1"]),
  101:     {ok, _P3, N3} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "4"]),
  102:     {ok, _P4, N4} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "8"]),
  103:     ok = io:format("~p~n", [[N1, N2, N3, N4]]),
  104:     {hej,_,N1} = rpc:call(N1, ?MODULE, f, []),
  105:     {hej,_,N2} = rpc:call(N2, ?MODULE, f, [], 2000),
  106:     {badrpc,timeout} = rpc:call(N3, ?MODULE, f, [], 2000),
  107:     receive after 6000 -> ok end,
  108:     [] = flush([]),
  109:     {hej,_,N4} = rpc:call(N4, ?MODULE, f, []),
  110:     {badrpc, nodedown} = rpc:call(gurka, ?MODULE, f, []),
  111:     ok.
  112: 
  113: 
  114: call_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
  116:                   {badrpc, timeout} = rpc:call(Node, erlang, send,
  117:                                                [self(), SendMe],
  118:                                                Timeout)
  119:           end,
  120:     reqtmo_test(Fun).
  121: 
  122: reqtmo_test(Test) ->
  123:     %% Tests that we time out in time also when the request itself
  124:     %% does not get through. A typical issue we have had
  125:     %% in the past, is that the timeout has not triggered until
  126:     %% the request has gotten through...
  127:     
  128:     Timeout = 500,
  129:     WaitBlock = 100,
  130:     BlockTime = 1000,
  131: 
  132:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  133: 
  134:     erpc:call(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [available_internal_state,
  135:                                                      true]),
  136:     
  137:     SendMe = make_ref(),
  138: 
  139:     erpc:cast(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [block, BlockTime]),
  140:     receive after WaitBlock -> ok end,
  141:     
  142:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  143: 
  144:     Test(Node, SendMe, Timeout),
  145: 
  146:     Stop = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  147:     Time = erlang:convert_time_unit(Stop-Start, native, millisecond),
  148:     io:format("Actual time: ~p ms~n", [Time]),
  149:     true = Time >= Timeout,
  150:     true = Time =< Timeout + 200,
  151:     
  152:     receive SendMe -> ok end,
  153:     
  154:     receive UnexpectedMsg -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, UnexpectedMsg})
  155:     after 0 -> ok
  156:     end,
  157:     
  158:     peer:stop(Peer),
  159:     
  160:     {comment,
  161:      "Timeout = " ++ integer_to_list(Timeout)
  162:      ++ " Actual = " ++ integer_to_list(Time)}.
  163: 
  164: 
  165: %% Test different rpc calls.
  166: block_call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  167:     {ok, _P1, N1} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "3"]),
  168:     {ok, _P2, N2} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "1"]),
  169:     {ok, _P3, N3} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "4"]),
  170:     {ok, _P4, N4} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "8"]),
  171:     ok = io:format("~p~n", [[N1, N2, N3]]),
  172:     {hej,_,N1} = rpc:block_call(N1, ?MODULE, f, []),
  173:     {hej,_,N2} = rpc:block_call(N2, ?MODULE, f, [], 2000),
  174:     {badrpc,timeout} = rpc:block_call(N3, ?MODULE, f, [], 2000),
  175:     receive after 6000 -> ok end,
  176:     [] = flush([]),
  177:     {hej,_,N4} = rpc:block_call(N4, ?MODULE, f, []),
  178:     ok.
  179: 
  180: 
  181: %% OTP-3449.
  182: multicall(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  183:     {ok, _P1, N1} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "3"]),
  184:     {ok, _P2, N2} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "1"]),
  185:     ok = io:format("~p~n", [[N1, N2]]),
  186:     {[{hej,_,N1},{hej,_,N2}],[]} =
  187: 	rpc:multicall([N1, N2], ?MODULE, f, []),
  188:     Msgs = flush([]),
  189:     [] = Msgs,
  190:     ok.
  191: 
  192: multicall_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  193:     {ok, _P1, N1} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "11"]),
  194:     {ok, _P2, N2} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "8"]),
  195:     {ok, _P3, N3} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "5"]),
  196:     {ok, _P4, N4} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "2"]),
  197:     ok = io:format("~p~n", [[N1, N2, N3, N4]]),
  198:     {[{hej,_,N3},{hej,_,N4}],[N1, N2]} =
  199: 	rpc:multicall([N3, N1, N2, N4], ?MODULE, f, [], 6000),
  200:     ct:sleep({seconds,8}),			%Wait for late answers
  201:     Msgs = flush([]),
  202:     [] = Msgs,
  203:     ok.
  204: 
  205: multicall_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  206:     {ok, Peer1, QuickNode1} = ?CT_PEER(),
  207:     {ok, Peer2, QuickNode2} = ?CT_PEER(),
  208:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
  209:                   Me = self(),
  210:                   SlowSend = fun () ->
  211:                                      if node() == Node ->
  212:                                              Me ! SendMe,
  213:                                              done;
  214:                                         true ->
  215:                                              done
  216:                                      end
  217:                              end,
  218:                   {[done, done], [Node]}
  219:                       = rpc:multicall([QuickNode1, Node, QuickNode2],
  220:                                       erlang, apply, [SlowSend, []],
  221:                                       Timeout)
  222:           end,
  223:     Res = reqtmo_test(Fun),
  224:     peer:stop(Peer1),
  225:     peer:stop(Peer2),
  226:     Res.
  227: 
  228: 
  229: multicall_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  230:     {ok, P1, N1} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
  231:     {ok, P2, N2} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
  232:     Nodes = [N1, N2],
  233:     %%
  234:     {[{badrpc, {'EXIT', normal}}, {badrpc, {'EXIT', normal}}], []} =
  235: 	do_multicall(Nodes, erlang, exit, [normal]),
  236:     {[{badrpc, {'EXIT', abnormal}}, {badrpc, {'EXIT', abnormal}}], []} =
  237: 	do_multicall(Nodes, erlang, exit, [abnormal]),
  238:     {[{badrpc, {'EXIT', {badarith, _}}},
  239:       {badrpc, {'EXIT', {badarith, _}}}],
  240:      []} =
  241: 	do_multicall(Nodes, erlang, 'div', [1, 0]),
  242:     {[{badrpc, {'EXIT', {badarg, _}}},
  243:       {badrpc, {'EXIT', {badarg, _}}}],
  244:      []} =
  245: 	do_multicall(Nodes, erlang, atom_to_list, [1]),
  246:     {[{badrpc, {'EXIT', {undef, _}}},
  247:       {badrpc, {'EXIT', {undef, _}}}],
  248:      []} =
  249: 	do_multicall(Nodes, ?MODULE, suicide, []),
  250:     {[timeout, timeout], []} =
  251: 	do_multicall(Nodes, ?MODULE, suicide, [link, normal]),
  252:     {[{badrpc, {'EXIT', abnormal}}, {badrpc, {'EXIT', abnormal}}], []} =
  253: 	do_multicall(Nodes, ?MODULE, suicide, [link, abnormal]),
  254:     {[timeout, timeout], []} =
  255: 	do_multicall(Nodes, ?MODULE, suicide, [exit, normal]),
  256:     {[{badrpc, {'EXIT', abnormal}}, {badrpc, {'EXIT', abnormal}}], []} =
  257: 	do_multicall(Nodes, ?MODULE, suicide, [exit, abnormal]),
  258:     {[{badrpc, {'EXIT', killed}}, {badrpc, {'EXIT', killed}}], []} =
  259: 	do_multicall(Nodes, ?MODULE, suicide, [exit, kill]),
  260:     %%
  261:     peer:stop(P1),
  262:     peer:stop(P2),
  263:     ok.
  264: 
  265: do_multicall(Nodes, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  266:     ok = io:format("~p:~p~p~n", [Mod, Func, Args]),
  267:     Result = rpc:multicall(Nodes, Mod, Func, Args),
  268:     Msgs = flush([]),
  269:     [] = Msgs,
  270:     Result.
  271: 
  272: 
  273: 
  274: multicall_node_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  275:     do_multicall_2_nodes_dies(?MODULE, suicide, [erlang, halt, []]),
  276:     do_multicall_2_nodes_dies(?MODULE, suicide, [init, stop, []]),
  277:     do_multicall_2_nodes_dies(?MODULE, suicide, [rpc, stop, []]),
  278:     ok.
  279: 
  280: do_multicall_2_nodes_dies(Mod, Func, Args) ->
  281:     ok = io:format("~p:~p~p~n", [Mod, Func, Args]),
  282:     {ok, _P1, N1} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0, args => ["-connect_all", "false"]}),
  283:     {ok, _P2, N2} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0, args => ["-connect_all", "false"]}),
  284:     Nodes = [N1, N2],
  285:     case {Mod, Func, rpc:multicall(Nodes, Mod, Func, Args)} of
  286:         {_, _, {[], Nodes}} ->
  287:             ok;
  288:         {init, stop, {OkNs, ErrNs}} ->
  289:             %% The killed reason might reach us before the nodedown...
  290:             Killed = {badrpc, {'EXIT', killed}},
  291:             case length(ErrNs) of
  292:                 1 -> [Killed] = OkNs;
  293:                 0 -> [Killed, Killed] = OkNs
  294:             end
  295:     end,
  296:         
  297:     Msgs = flush([]),
  298:     [] = Msgs,
  299:     ok.
  300: 
  301: 
  302: %% OTP-3766.
  303: called_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  304:     {ok, P, N} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
  305:     %%
  306:     rep(fun (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  307: 		{Tag,{badrpc,{'EXIT',normal}}} =
  308: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  309: 	end, N, erlang, exit, [normal]),
  310:     rep(fun (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  311: 		{Tag,{badrpc,{'EXIT',abnormal}}} =
  312: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  313: 	end, N, erlang, exit, [abnormal]),
  314:     rep(fun (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  315: 		{Tag,{badrpc,{'EXIT',{badarith,_}}}} =
  316: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  317: 	end, N, erlang, 'div', [1,0]),
  318:     rep(fun (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  319: 		{Tag,{badrpc,{'EXIT',{badarg,_}}}} =
  320: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  321: 	end, N, erlang, atom_to_list, [1]),
  322:     rep(fun (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  323: 		{Tag,{badrpc,{'EXIT',{undef,_}}}} =
  324: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  325: 	end, N, ?MODULE, suicide, []),
  326:     %%
  327:     TrapExit = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  328:     %%
  329:     rep(fun (Tag, call, Args=[Node|_]) when Node == node() ->
  330: 		{Tag,timeout} =
  331: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, call, Args)},
  332: 		{Tag,flush,[{'EXIT',_,normal}]} =
  333: 		    {Tag,flush,flush([])};
  334: 	    (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  335: 		{Tag,timeout} =
  336: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  337: 	end, N, ?MODULE, suicide, [link,normal]),
  338:     rep(fun (Tag, call, Args=[Node|_]) when Node == node() ->
  339: 		{Tag,timeout} =
  340: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, call, Args)},
  341: 		{Tag,flush,[{'EXIT',_,abnormal}]} =
  342: 		    {Tag,flush,flush([])};
  343: 	    (Tag, Call, Args=[Node|_]) when Node == node() ->
  344: 		{Tag,timeout} =
  345: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)};
  346: 	    (Tag, block_call, Args) ->
  347: 		{Tag,timeout} =
  348: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, block_call, Args)};
  349: 	    (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  350: 		{Tag,{badrpc,{'EXIT',abnormal}}} =
  351: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  352: 	end, N, ?MODULE, suicide, [link,abnormal]),
  353:     rep(fun (Tag, call, Args=[Node|_]) when Node == node() ->
  354: 		{Tag,timeout} =
  355: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, call, Args)},
  356: 		{Tag,flush,[{'EXIT',_,normal}]} =
  357: 		    {Tag,flush,flush([])};
  358: 	    (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  359: 		{Tag,timeout} =
  360: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  361: 	end, N, ?MODULE, suicide, [exit,normal]),
  362:     rep(fun (Tag, call, Args=[Node|_]) when Node == node() ->
  363: 		{Tag,timeout} =
  364: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, call, Args)},
  365: 		{Tag,flush,[{'EXIT',_,abnormal}]} =
  366: 		    {Tag,flush,flush([])};
  367: 	    (Tag, Call, Args=[Node|_]) when Node == node() ->
  368: 		{Tag,timeout} =
  369: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)};
  370: 	    (Tag, block_call, Args) ->
  371: 		{Tag,timeout} =
  372: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, block_call, Args)};
  373: 	    (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  374: 		{Tag,{badrpc,{'EXIT',abnormal}}} =
  375: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  376: 	end, N, ?MODULE, suicide, [exit,abnormal]),
  377:     %%
  378:     process_flag(trap_exit, TrapExit),
  379:     %%
  380:     rep(fun %% A local [exit,kill] would kill the test case process
  381: 	    (_Tag, _Call, [Node|_]) when Node == node() ->
  382: 	       ok;
  383: 	    %% A block_call [exit,kill] would kill the rpc server
  384: 	    (_Tag, block_call, _Args) -> ok;
  385: 	    (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  386: 	       {Tag,{badrpc,{'EXIT',killed}}} =
  387: 		   {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  388:        end, N, ?MODULE, suicide, [exit,kill]),
  389:     %%
  390:     [] = flush([]),
  391:     peer:stop(P),
  392:     ok.
  393: 
  394: rep(Fun, N, M, F, A) ->
  395:     Fun(1, call, [node(), M, F, A]),
  396:     Fun(2, call, [node(), M, F, A, infinity]),
  397:     Fun(3, call, [N, M, F, A]),
  398:     Fun(4, call, [N, M, F, A, infinity]),
  399:     Fun(5, call, [N, M, F, A, 3000]),
  400:     Fun(6, block_call, [node(), M, F, A]),
  401:     Fun(7, block_call, [node(), M, F, A, infinity]),
  402:     Fun(8, block_call, [N, M, F, A]),
  403:     Fun(9, block_call, [N, M, F, A, infinity]),
  404:     Fun(10, block_call, [N, M, F, A, 3000]),
  405:     ok.
  406: 
  407: 
  408: suicide(link, Reason) ->
  409:     spawn_link(
  410:       fun() ->
  411: 	      exit(Reason)
  412:       end),
  413:     receive after 2000 -> timeout end;
  414: suicide(exit, Reason) ->
  415:     Self = self(),
  416:     spawn(
  417:       fun() ->
  418: 	      exit(Self, Reason)
  419:       end),
  420:     receive after 2000 -> timeout end.
  421: 
  422: suicide(erlang, exit, [Name, Reason]) when is_atom(Name) ->
  423:     case whereis(Name) of
  424: 	Pid when is_pid(Pid) -> suicide(erlang, exit, [Pid, Reason])
  425:     end;
  426: suicide(Mod, Func, Args) ->
  427:     spawn_link(
  428:       fun() ->
  429: 	      apply(Mod, Func, Args)
  430:       end),
  431:     receive after 10000 -> timeout end.
  432: 
  433: 
  434: 
  435: called_node_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  436:     node_rep(
  437:       fun (Call, Args) ->
  438: 	      {badrpc,nodedown} = apply(rpc, Call, Args)
  439:       end, ?MODULE, suicide, [erlang,halt,[]]),
  440: 
  441:     node_rep(
  442:       fun (Call, Args) ->
  443: 	      {badrpc,nodedown} = apply(rpc, Call, Args)
  444:       end, ?MODULE, suicide, [init,stop,[]]),
  445: 
  446:     node_rep(
  447:       fun (block_call, Args=[_|_]) ->
  448: 	      {badrpc,{'EXIT',{killed,_}}} = apply(rpc, block_call, Args);
  449:           (call, Args=[_|_]) ->
  450: 	      {badrpc,nodedown} = apply(rpc, call, Args)
  451:       end, ?MODULE, suicide, [erlang,exit,[rex,kill]]),
  452: 
  453:     node_rep(
  454:       fun (block_call, _Args) ->
  455: 	      %% Cannot block call rpc - will hang
  456: 	      ok;
  457: 	  (Call, Args=[_|_]) ->
  458: 	      {badrpc,nodedown} = apply(rpc, Call, Args)
  459:       end, ?MODULE, suicide, [rpc,stop,[]]),
  460: 
  461:     ok.
  462: 
  463: node_rep(Fun, M, F, A) ->
  464:     node_rep_call(call, [M,F,A], Fun),
  465:     node_rep_call(call, [M,F,A,infinity], Fun),
  466:     node_rep_call(block_call, [M,F,A], Fun),
  467:     node_rep_call(block_call, [M,F,A,infinity], Fun).
  468: 
  469: node_rep_call(Call, Args, Fun) ->
  470:     {ok, _P, N} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0, args => ["-connect_all", "false"]}),
  471:     Fun(Call, [N|Args]),
  472:     ok.
  473: 
  474: %% OTP-3766.
  475: called_throws(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  476:     {ok, P, N} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
  477:     %%
  478:     rep(fun (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  479: 		{Tag,up} =
  480: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  481: 	end, N, erlang, throw, [up]),
  482:     rep(fun (Tag, Call, Args) ->
  483: 		{Tag,{badrpc,{'EXIT',reason}}} =
  484: 		    {Tag,apply(rpc, Call, Args)}
  485: 	end, N, erlang, throw, [{'EXIT',reason}]),
  486:     %%
  487:     peer:stop(P),
  488:     ok.
  489: 
  490: 
  491: 
  492: call_benchmark(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  493:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
  494:     Iter = case erlang:system_info(modified_timing_level) of
  495: 	       undefined -> 10000;
  496: 	       _ -> 500		     %Modified timing - spawn is slower
  497: 	   end,
  498:     Res = do_call_benchmark(Node, Iter),
  499:     peer:stop(Peer),
  500:     Res.
  501: 
  502: do_call_benchmark(Node, M) when is_integer(M), M > 0 ->
  503:     {Micros,ok} = timer:tc(fun() ->
  504: 				   do_call_benchmark(Node, 0, M)
  505: 			   end),
  506:     Calls = 3*M,
  507:     S = io_lib:format("~p RPC calls/second", [Calls*1000000 div Micros]),
  508:     {comment,lists:flatten(S)}.
  509: 
  510: do_call_benchmark(_Node, M, M) ->
  511:     ok;
  512: do_call_benchmark(Node, I, M) ->
  513:     Node = rpc:call(Node, erlang, node, []),
  514:     _ = rpc:call(Node, erlang, whereis, [rex]),
  515:     3 = rpc:call(Node, erlang, '+', [1,2]),
  516:     do_call_benchmark(Node, I+1, M).
  517: 
  518: async_call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  519:     {ok, _Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "1"]),
  520:     {ok, _Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "10"]),
  521:     {ok, _Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false", "-rpc_test_delay", "20"]),
  522:     %% Note: First part of nodename sets response delay in seconds.
  523:     Promise1 = rpc:async_call(Node1, ?MODULE, f, []),
  524:     Promise2 = rpc:async_call(Node2, ?MODULE, f, []),
  525:     Promise3 = rpc:async_call(Node3, ?MODULE, f, []),
  526: 
  527:     %% Test fast timeouts.
  528:     timeout = rpc:nb_yield(Promise2),
  529:     timeout = rpc:nb_yield(Promise2, 10),
  530: 
  531:     %% Let Node1 finish its work before yielding.
  532:     ct:sleep({seconds,2}),
  533:     {hej,_,Node1} = rpc:yield(Promise1),
  534: 
  535:     %% Wait for the Node2 and Node3.
  536:     {value,{hej,_,Node2}} = rpc:nb_yield(Promise2, infinity),
  537:     {hej,_,Node3} = rpc:yield(Promise3),
  538:     ok.
  539: 
  540: call_against_old_node(Config) ->
  541:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
  542:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
  543:                       OldRelName,
  544:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
  545:         not_available ->
  546: 	    {skipped, "No OTP "++OldRel++" available"};
  547:         {ok, PeerOld, NodeOld} ->
  548:             NodeOld = rpc:call(NodeOld, erlang, node, []),
  549:             peer:stop(PeerOld),
  550:             ok
  551:     end.
  552: 
  553: multicall_mix(Config) ->
  554:     {ok, _Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
  555:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
  556:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
  557:     {{ok, _Peer3, Node3}, OldNodeTest}
  558:         = case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
  559:                             OldRelName,
  560:                             proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
  561:               {ok, _, _} = OldNRes ->
  562:                   {OldNRes, true};
  563:               not_available ->
  564:                   {?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}), false}
  565:           end,
  566:     {ok, _Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
  567:     {ok, _Peer5, Node5} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
  568:     peer:stop(Peer2),
  569:     
  570:     [] = flush([]),
  571: 
  572:     ThisNode = node(),
  573:     Nodes = [ThisNode, Node1, Node2, Node3, Node4, Node5],
  574:     
  575:     {[ThisNode,
  576:       Node1,
  577:       Node3,
  578:       Node4,
  579:       Node5],
  580:      [Node2]}
  581:         = rpc:multicall(Nodes, erlang, node, []),
  582:     
  583:     [] = flush([]),
  584: 
  585:     {[Node5,
  586:       ThisNode,
  587:       Node1,
  588:       Node3,
  589:       Node4,
  590:       Node5,
  591:       Node1,
  592:       ThisNode],
  593:      [Node2]}
  594:         = rpc:multicall([Node5|Nodes]++[Node1, ThisNode], erlang, node, []),
  595:     
  596:     [] = flush([]),
  597: 
  598:     {[BlingError,
  599:       BlingError,
  600:       {badrpc, {'EXIT', _}},
  601:       BlingError,
  602:       BlingError],
  603:      [Node2]}
  604:         = rpc:multicall(Nodes, ?MODULE, call_func1, [bling]),
  605: 
  606:     [] = flush([]),
  607: 
  608:     {badrpc, {'EXIT',
  609:               {bling,
  610:                [{?MODULE, call_func2, A, _},
  611:                 {?MODULE, call_func1, 1, _}]}}} = BlingError,
  612:     true = (A == 1) orelse (A == [bling]),
  613: 
  614:     {[], Nodes}
  615:         = rpc:multicall(Nodes, timer, sleep, [100], 50),
  616: 
  617:     OtherNodes = Nodes -- [ThisNode],
  618: 
  619:     [] = flush([]),
  620: 
  621:     
  622:     {[ThisNode,
  623:       Node1,
  624:       Node3,
  625:       Node4,
  626:       Node5],
  627:      [Node2, badnodename]}
  628:         = rpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [badnodename], erlang, node, []),
  629: 
  630:     try
  631:         rpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [<<"badnodename">>], erlang, node, []),
  632:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  633:     catch
  634:         error:_ ->
  635:             ok
  636:     end,
  637: 
  638:     [] = flush([]),
  639: 
  640:     try
  641:         rpc:multicall([Node1, Node2, Node3, Node4, Node5 | ThisNode], erlang, node, []),
  642:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  643:     catch
  644:         error:_ ->
  645:             ok
  646:     end,
  647: 
  648:     [] = flush([]),
  649: 
  650:     try
  651:         rpc:multicall(Nodes, erlang, node, [], (1 bsl 32)),
  652:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  653:     catch
  654:         error:_ ->
  655:             ok
  656:     end,
  657:     
  658:     [] = flush([]),
  659: 
  660:     {[], OtherNodes}
  661:         = rpc:multicall(OtherNodes, erlang, halt, []),
  662: 
  663:     [] = flush([]),
  664: 
  665:     case OldNodeTest of
  666:         true -> {comment, "Test with OTP "++OldRel++" node as well"};
  667:         false -> {comment, "Test without OTP "++OldRel}
  668:     end.
  669: 
  670: call_func1(X) ->
  671:     call_func2(X),
  672:     ok.
  673: 
  674: call_func2(X) ->
  675:     erlang:error(X, [X]).
  676: 
  677: timeout_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  678:     Node = node(),
  679:     MaxTmo = (1 bsl 32) - 1,
  680:     erlang:send_after(100, self(), dummy_message),
  681:     try
  682:         receive
  683:             M ->
  684:                 M
  685:         after MaxTmo + 1 ->
  686:                 ok
  687:         end,
  688:         ct:fail("The ?MAX_INT_TIMEOUT define in rpc.erl needs "
  689:                 "to be updated to reflect max timeout value "
  690:                 "in a receive/after...")
  691:     catch
  692:         error:timeout_value ->
  693:             ok
  694:     end,
  695:     Node = rpc:call(Node, erlang, node, [], MaxTmo),
  696:     try
  697:         {badrpc, _} = rpc:call(Node, erlang, node, [], MaxTmo+1),
  698:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  699:     catch
  700:         error:_ ->
  701:             ok
  702:     end,
  703:     Node = rpc:block_call(Node, erlang, node, [], MaxTmo),
  704:     try
  705:         {badrpc, _} = rpc:block_call(Node, erlang, node, [], MaxTmo+1),
  706:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  707:     catch
  708:         error:_ ->
  709:             ok
  710:     end,
  711:     {[Node],[]} = rpc:multicall([Node], erlang, node, [], MaxTmo),
  712:     try
  713:         rpc:multicall([Node], erlang, node, [], MaxTmo+1),
  714:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  715:     catch
  716:         error:_ ->
  717:             ok
  718:     end,
  719:     ok.
  720:     
  721: 
  722: call_old_against_new(Config) ->
  723:     try
  724:         test_on_old_node(Config, call_old_against_new_test, 1, 1)
  725:     catch
  726:         throw:{skipped, _} = Skipped ->
  727:             Skipped
  728:     end.
  729: 
  730: call_old_against_new_test([NodeOld], [NodeCurr]) ->
  731:     %% Executed on an OTP old node
  732: 
  733:     NodeOld = rpc:call(NodeOld, erlang, node, []),
  734:     NodeCurr = rpc:call(NodeCurr, erlang, node, []),
  735: 
  736:     {badrpc, {'EXIT', bang}} = rpc:call(NodeOld, erlang, exit, [bang]),
  737:     {badrpc, {'EXIT', bang}} = rpc:call(NodeCurr, erlang, exit, [bang]),
  738: 
  739:     {badrpc, {'EXIT', {blong, _}}} = rpc:call(NodeOld, erlang, error, [blong]),
  740:     {badrpc, {'EXIT', {blong, _}}} = rpc:call(NodeCurr, erlang, error, [blong]),
  741: 
  742:     bling = rpc:call(NodeOld, erlang, throw, [bling]),
  743:     bling = rpc:call(NodeCurr, erlang, throw, [bling]),
  744: 
  745:     {badrpc, timeout} = rpc:call(NodeOld, timer, sleep, [1000], 100),
  746:     {badrpc, timeout} = rpc:call(NodeCurr, timer, sleep, [1000], 100),
  747: 
  748:     {badrpc, nodedown} = rpc:call(NodeOld, erlang, halt, []),
  749:     {badrpc, nodedown} = rpc:call(NodeCurr, erlang, halt, []),
  750: 
  751:     {badrpc, nodedown} = rpc:call(NodeOld, erlang, node, []),
  752:     {badrpc, nodedown} = rpc:call(NodeCurr, erlang, node, []),
  753: 
  754:     ok.
  755:     
  756: multicall_old_against_new(Config) ->
  757:     try
  758:         test_on_old_node(Config, multicall_old_against_new_test, 2, 2)
  759:     catch
  760:         throw:{skipped, _} = Skipped ->
  761:             Skipped
  762:     end.
  763: 
  764: multicall_old_against_new_test([NodeOldA, NodeOldB], [NodeCurrA, NodeCurrB]) ->
  765:     %% Executed on an OTP old node
  766: 
  767:     AllNodes = [NodeCurrA, NodeOldA, NodeCurrB, NodeOldB],
  768:     NoNodes = length(AllNodes),
  769: 
  770:     {AllNodes, []} = rpc:multicall(AllNodes, erlang, node, []),
  771: 
  772:     Bang = lists:duplicate(NoNodes, {badrpc, {'EXIT', bang}}),
  773:     {Bang, []} = rpc:multicall(AllNodes, erlang, exit, [bang]),
  774: 
  775:     {[{badrpc, {'EXIT', {blong, _}}},
  776:       {badrpc, {'EXIT', {blong, _}}},
  777:       {badrpc, {'EXIT', {blong, _}}},
  778:       {badrpc, {'EXIT', {blong, _}}}], []} = rpc:multicall(AllNodes, erlang, error, [blong]),
  779: 
  780:     Bling = lists:duplicate(NoNodes, bling),
  781:     {Bling, []} = rpc:multicall(AllNodes, erlang, throw, [bling]),
  782: 
  783:     {[], AllNodes} = rpc:multicall(AllNodes, timer, sleep, [1000], 100),
  784: 
  785:     {AllNodes, []} = rpc:multicall(AllNodes, erlang, node, []),
  786: 
  787:     {[], AllNodes} = rpc:multicall(AllNodes, erlang, halt, []),
  788: 
  789:     {[], AllNodes} = rpc:multicall(AllNodes, erlang, node, []),
  790: 
  791:     ok.
  792: 
  793: cast_old_against_new(Config) ->
  794:     try
  795:         test_on_old_node(Config, cast_old_against_new_test, 1, 1)
  796:     catch
  797:         throw:{skipped, _} = Skipped ->
  798:             Skipped
  799:     end.
  800: 
  801: cast_old_against_new_test([NodeOld], [NodeCurr]) ->
  802:     %% Executed on an OTP old node
  803: 
  804:     Me = self(),
  805:     Ref = make_ref(),
  806:     true = rpc:cast(NodeOld, erlang, send, [Me, {Ref, 1}]),
  807:     receive {Ref, 1} -> ok end,
  808:     true = rpc:cast(NodeCurr, erlang, send, [Me, {Ref, 2}]),
  809:     receive {Ref, 2} -> ok end,
  810: 
  811:     true = rpc:cast(NodeOld, erlang, halt, []),
  812:     true = rpc:cast(NodeCurr, erlang, halt, []),
  813: 
  814:     monitor_node(NodeOld, true),
  815:     receive {nodedown, NodeOld} -> ok end,
  816:     monitor_node(NodeCurr, true),
  817:     receive {nodedown, NodeCurr} -> ok end,
  818: 
  819:     true = rpc:cast(NodeOld, erlang, send, [Me, {Ref, 3}]),
  820:     true = rpc:cast(NodeCurr, erlang, send, [Me, {Ref, 4}]),
  821: 
  822:     receive Msg -> error({unexpected_message, Msg})
  823:     after 1000 -> ok
  824:     end.
  825: 
  826: %%%
  827: %%% Utility functions.
  828: %%%
  829: 
  830: old_release() ->
  831:     OldRel = integer_to_list(list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release))-2),
  832:     {OldRel++"_latest", OldRel}.
  833: 
  834: flush(L) ->
  835:     receive
  836: 	M ->
  837: 	    flush([M|L])
  838:     after 0 ->
  839: 	    L
  840:     end.
  841: 
  842: t() ->
  843:     Delay = case init:get_argument(rpc_test_delay) of
  844:                 {ok,[[D]]} -> list_to_integer(D);
  845:                 _ -> 0
  846:             end,
  847:     1000*Delay.
  848: 
  849: f() ->
  850:     timer:sleep(T=t()),
  851:     spawn(?MODULE, f2, []),
  852:     {hej,T,node()}.
  853: 
  854: f2() ->
  855:     timer:sleep(500),
  856:     halt().
  857: 
  858: test_on_old_node(Config, Test, NoOld, NoCurr) ->
  859:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
  860:     NodesOldRes = lists:map(fun (_) ->
  861:                                     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
  862:                                                       OldRelName,
  863:                                                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
  864:                                         not_available ->
  865:                                             throw({skipped, "No OTP "++OldRel++" available"});
  866:                                         {ok, _, _} = Ok ->
  867:                                             Ok
  868:                                     end
  869:                             end,
  870:                             lists:seq(1, NoOld+1)),
  871:     NodesCurrRes = lists:map(fun (_) ->
  872:                                      {ok, _, _} = ?CT_PEER()
  873:                              end,
  874:                              lists:seq(1, NoCurr)),
  875:     NFun = fun ({ok, _Peer, Node}) -> Node end,
  876:     NodesOld = lists:map(NFun, NodesOldRes),
  877:     NodesCurr = lists:map(NFun, NodesCurrRes),
  878: 
  879:     %% Recompile rpc_SUITE on old node and load it on all old nodes...
  880:     SrcFile = filename:rootname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ ".erl",
  881:     {ok, ?MODULE, BeamCode} = rpc:call(hd(NodesOld), compile, file, [SrcFile, [binary]]),
  882:     LoadResult = lists:duplicate(length(NodesOld), {module, ?MODULE}),
  883:     {LoadResult, []} = rpc:multicall(NodesOld, code, load_binary, [?MODULE, SrcFile, BeamCode]),
  884:     %% Execute test on first old node...
  885:     Pid = spawn_link(hd(NodesOld), ?MODULE, Test, [tl(NodesOld), NodesCurr]),
  886:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
  887:     receive
  888:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} when Reason == normal; Reason == noproc ->
  889:             ok
  890:     end,
  891:     ok.
